attributes.action: Allow carers to claim for more than one disabled person/child
attributes.additional_details:
As a parent with 2 disabled children, like many other carers can only claim once as a carer. Even tho we still care for the other child or disabled person. Allow carers to claim for another disabled person if caring for them.
We save the government tens of thousand of £ per year by working for free when we are unable to do paid work when we are needed at home.
